author: Josh
install_msg: Twitch Plays Pokemon cog installed! Use [p]tpp help to get started.
name: TwitchPlaysPokemon
short: Community-driven Pokemon gameplay through Discord messages.
description: Allows Discord users to collectively control a Pokemon game by sending button inputs as chat messages. The game screen is periodically posted as screenshots.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
